Grassroots Disaster Preparedness in NYC

From 9/11 to Hurricane Sandy to the Covid-19 pandemic, we are New Yorkers coming together to look out for one another.

Our Strengths

What We've Done

NMPPR organizers and the communities they serve accomplished great things during the Covid-19 pandemic, with your help.

"These humans are so much easier to stop from killing each other!"
Murderbot / Security Contractor, PreservationAUX

How We Win

Rapid Prototyping

Makerspaces, workshops and industrial partners across the city and country can collaborate to create emergency supplies faster than traditional supply chains can respond.

Local Logistics

Anyone with a bicycle, scooter or car can help deliver aid and supplies to the people who need it most.

Knowledge Sharing

Every disaster generates lessons learned, which we can capture and share to empower people in future situations.

Your Support

We are a 501(c)(3) public charity, funded by small donations from people like you.

Get in touch, get involved.
